specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12” count as having the Furious rule.
specialRules.name: Alien Hunter
specialRules.label: Alien Hunter
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12” count as having the Furious rule.

specialRules.hint: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are within 12” of this model.
specialRules.name: Beacon
specialRules.label: Beacon
specialRules.description: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are within 12” of this model.

specialRules.hint: Enemy units can’t use Ambush within 18” of the hero.
specialRules.name: Daemon Hunter
specialRules.label: Daemon Hunter
specialRules.description: Enemy units can’t use Ambush within 18” of the hero.

specialRules.hint: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.
specialRules.name: Shield Wall
specialRules.label: Shield Wall
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.hint: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.
specialRules.name: Witch Hunter
specialRules.label: Witch Hunter
specialRules.description: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Flame Breath
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protective Dome
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Expel
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Psychic Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Tempest
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
